delete_vault_modal_content: Do you really want to delete the Vault {{vaultName}}?
delete_vault_modal_warning: Warning, this action will result in the deletion of all associated services.
delete_vault_banner_success: Your Vault {{vaultName}} has been successfully deleted.
delete_vault_banner_error: An error occurred. Please wait a few minutes before trying again.
delete_vault_disabled_tooltip: You cannot delete a Vault linked to VSPC Tenants.
unable_to_delete_vault_feature_unavailab: Deleting a Vault is not available from the interface for security reasons. If you wish to delete a Vault, please contact support.
